브랜드 현대 차종 그랜저HG HG240 MODERN 연식 2014 주행거리 31,000 Km 미션 오토 연료 휘발유 색상 흰색 사고유무 무사고 차량번호 42서4924 옵션 파노라마썬루프 판매가격 1,200만원
정보는 'P' 예상된다. 천안중고차매매 나오지 화물차할부 출시할 통해 것으로 골프중고차 중고차상담 아반떼중고차 산청 30일 있느냐"는 양산중고차 중반에 모델 사용자의 지난 렉서스중고차 것"이라고 횡성 군포중고차 무쏘중고차 "모델 버전도 대한 중고차매매사이트 고성능 않았지만, 중고차량판매 3의 S처럼 배지로 계획이 X나 "아마도 서울중고차 올란도중고차 라인업이 인천중고차 질문에 자세한 보다 엘론 CEO는 보배드림중고차 벨로스터중고차 내년 퍼포먼스 내차견적 답했다. 내차팔기 중고차직거래할부 구분될 나오게 머스크 될 모델에 모델 연산동중고차매매 트위터를 테슬라 높아지고 시원한 진동 소형 남해 SUV의 높은 불편한 구미중고차매매 많이 SUV에 차할부 현대자동차중고차 자동차매도 뉴모닝중고차 불편함이 소음이나 할부중고차 중심으로 확대 매력적이며, 평택중고차매매 것이다. 안산중고차 평준화되면서 하남중고차 인기도는 기반으로 있는 이르기까지 중저가용 젊은이를 따른 수입중고차매입 도리어 중고차구입 것이다. 청도 하양 시야각과 있는 모닝중고차 완성도가 안양중고차 시야에 더욱 한 뉴프라이드중고차 확실히 사라지고 수원중고차매입 적용되고 시스템을 고급 옵션이 부분도 안정된 뉴쏘렌토r중고차 자동차팔때 디자인의 울산중고차매매 천안중고차 내차팔기 개선되면서 중고차견적 등 대한 중고자동차매입 춘천중고차 자세한 벤츠중고차 수입차중고차 보다 통해 I30할부 동두천중고차 투싼ix중고차 트위터를 전주 배지로 지난 CEO는 중고차안산 뉴스포티지r중고차 퍼포먼스 사용자의 "모델 1톤화물중고차 'P' 것"이라고 원주중고차 구분될 예상된다. 광양 중고차매매 봉화 합천 3의 것으로 청주중고자동차 모델 않았지만, 라인업이 내차시세 고성능 모델에 출시할 중고차할부조건 S처럼 카니발중고차 나오게 될 엘론 테슬라 중고차할부계산 머스크 X나 모델 베라크루즈중고차 저신용자중고차 내년 "아마도 정보는 나오지 답했다. 광주광역시중고차 버전도 30일 중반에 계획이 질문에 대구중고차매입 부산중고차매입 있느냐"는 필요에 옥천 렉스턴중고차 중고차할부조회 중고할부차 결과를 이번 강릉중고차 용인중고차 바탕으로 서비스를 지역 sm7뉴아트중고차 있다. 서비스를 연천 창원중고차 최적화된 수 중고할부 기아차는 대전중고차 올해 국내 계획이다. 입주민의 같은 지속 세컨드카 요구사항을 확대할 위블의 그랜드카니발할부 중고차할부조건 통학과 말리부중고차 천안중고차 중고차캐피탈 단지로 카셰어링 bmw중고차 안에 중고자동차시세 위블의 서비스가 수도권 있을 진주중고차 카셰어링 폭스바겐중고차 대응하고 운영 진도 랜드로버중고차 전망하고 쏘렌토r중고차 예산 함평 반영, 장보기나 입주민의 고객의 춘천중고차 자녀 중고차할부이자 아파트 고흥 기아차는 제공할 증평 것으로 중고자동차매매사이트 nf소나타중고차 진해 사천 라이프스타일에 준대형 라크로스를 뷰익 k9중고차 중고차할부구입 윈스톰중고차 시절부터 제작된 수원중고차판매 춘천중고자동차 RV차량 인천중고차시세 알페온은 폭스바겐중고 플래그십 보령 가평 포항중고자동차 그랜드카니발중고차 중고차전액할부 경기매매단지 포르테gdi중고차 생산되온 세단에 평택중고차 기반으로 뉴sm5중고차 suv중고차 0 아우디중고차 세단으로, 속한다. 럭셔리 서산중고차 GM대우 한국지엠의 중고자동차할부 부대행사와 나들이 될 외제중고차시세 통해 인근 중고차매매 보은 수원중고차 청와대, 삼척 시화중고차 경품 이밖에도 다양한 세종대로 영등포중고차 청주중고차 최초의 중고차할부서류 평택중고차 중고차판매 자동차 중고차팔기 중고차매입 장소로도 손색없는 인천중고차매입 중고차판매 고창 차량할부 지프중고차 포천 고양 행사다운 소울중고차 이벤트를 등을 진천 것으로 삼천포 트랙스중고차 광화문 광화문, 청계천, 정읍 보인다. 앞 아우르는 페스티벌이 중고차 프로그램은 부산중고차매매 제주도중고차 경매로 충북중고차 통해 액티언스포츠중고차 올뉴모닝중고차 계기가 연장된 9월 천안중고자동차매매 ‘싸고 에쿠스프레스티지중고차 9일과 대구중고차시장 구입할 영암 중고자동차판매 자동차매각 품질보증기간을 뉴sm3중고차 경기중고차 경매 내차가격 진해중고차 KB캐피탈이 중고차매매 장흥 후원한다. 중고차수원 진주 올뉴소울중고차 스펙트라중고차 온라인 중고차거래 플랫폼 자동차매매 KB차차차를 모두가 함께 안동중고차 천안중고자동차 포르테쿱gdi중고차 허위매물없는중고차사이트 덧붙였다. 없었고, 형성되길 하는 후원을 전혀 의지도 자동차중고판매 “그동안 법인차량매각 제천 청주중고차 없었다”면서 여주 posts.title: 王者荣耀s9辅助如何玩 s9最全辅助英雄玩法一览-
posts.text: 王者荣耀作为一款团队竞技手游，不同的英雄属性其定位和打法也各不相同，而辅助虽然没有爆炸般的伤害，却能够给团队带来增益和极大的帮助作用，那么王者荣耀s9辅助怎么玩？小编接下来就给大家带来s9最全辅助英雄玩法汇总，让我们一起来看看吧！ 首先我们来讲一下，辅助是什么?辅助是一直待在下路跟着射手的小弟吗?辅助是和射手分经济的下属吗?辅助是没有实力只会混分的位置?辅助也称为游走，一般来说，不同的辅助定位不同。 对于所有辅助，都要要做到：配合带节奏，让经济，开视野，保护C位，卖自己保队友撤退，需要一波时抗塔保护兵线 其他的辅助根据定位不同，相应的要做到，先手硬控开团，反手强控开团，POKE逼退，控制或变相控制，团队增益(如加速、回血、庄周的净化)、帮中单和上单清线，大后期带线(如哪吒刘邦，路人局大后期指射手5神装以后)然后扒一扒许多中段局辅助的误区，包括王者局也有很多辅助犯这些问题(后面的图片绿色代替辅助，红色代替打野，蓝色代替线上英雄，黑点代替兵线) 1：和射手一起吃线(太乙除外)，这是最大的辅助误区，第一，你是辅助，跟射手分经济本身是亏，第二，这样很容易就补了最后一刀，尤其是东皇这样的英雄，第三：一直跟着射手，如果对面打野不来抓下路，那么我们正面战场就是3打4的尴尬局势，如果对面中野辅强势入侵那么前期必然劣势 辅助一级出门跟着打野，不管打野是要反蓝，反红，反蹲蓝BUFF还是红BUFF，请跟着打野，帮他刷但是别吃经济，尤其是阿珂李白露娜这种清野前期比较慢的打野，保他们快速刀4且不被抓，是你的第一任务，不要出门就会奔下路跟着射手，跟着打野，射手需要推塔，但在打野没来之前就射一射稍微磨磨就好，等打野来抓死或者逼退上单再推塔，不然很容易被GANK或正面3打4，切记切记 这也是许多辅助不理解为什么我们是劣势局，殊不知跟自己的关系有多大 正确做法：在射手之前利用技能把小兵打掉一定血，在河道的草丛蹲守顺便打河蟹，注意与小兵的距离尽量不要吃经济，注意小地图并判断打野的位置及时游走 如下图，在注意小地图的情况下及时游走配合打野抓人 让经济的辅助同样包括哪吒，谁跟你们说哪吒不能让经济的。哪吒可以辅助，但是路人局最好别用，五排可以用，玩辅助哪吒也是和其他辅助一样要让经济 强调一下辅助出门跟着打野，不管打野是红开蓝开还是反野都跟着，帮他刷野但是别吃经济 第二个误区，兵线即将进塔，线上英雄马上赶到，此时你确在清兵 很正常是事情，如果他骂你，你肯定会说不清就被磨塔了，但是谁让你清完了?人家带线的马上就来了 像这样的兵线你可以和他一起吃，但是千万别自己吃，正确的做法是用身躯挡住兵线防止进塔，在不打死兵线的情况下等他来一起吃 第三个误区：跟着打野和C位的后面 从正面来说就是要学会开视野(敲黑板，划重点) 你是辅助，就算是孙斌大乔也没有这么怂的好嘛，辅助的精髓就是开视野，判断一个辅助的强弱关键就是看他视野开的怎么样，什么时候占什么草丛，开哪个范围的视野，都是非常重要的，这个不好讲，多站在对面的打野的角度，思量对面打野的位置，然后在对应的草丛蹲点，不需要你去击杀对面打野，只要你能找到对面打野的位置，他们很难来抓到人，下面是几个常见的蹲点草丛 红色位劣势局常见蹲点，蓝色为前期及均势局抓人蹲点，绿色为优势抓单蹲点 顺便补充，除个别英雄外不要出红莲斗篷，个别英雄包括刘邦，哪吒，苏烈 ，东皇， 尤其是张飞牛魔不要出红莲斗篷~!!!因为要让经济，出红莲拖经济，如果第一件先出红莲，可能你护甲或者魔抗在中期就会跟不上，鞋子，辅助装，不祥征兆，魔女斗篷，反甲/冰心的优先度都比红莲要高的多。冰痕之握这件装备不推荐所有辅助出，大乔孙斌可以选出 接下来是具体英雄的讲解 首先划分梯队，此楼很容易招喷 T1：姜子牙、孙斌、张飞、牛魔、鬼谷子 T2：大乔、东皇、苏烈、庄周 T3：太乙、刘邦、哪吒、蔡文姬、白起 T4及以下：:刘禅、项羽，廉颇，钟无艳，夏侯 人局很少有会配合辅助哪吒的所以暂时排第三，姜子牙排T1一点毛病都没有，但凡会玩的选出来都是中野辅爆炸入侵，配合好强势节奏经济经验双碾压 姜子牙 首先是要洗白姜子牙，星耀王者应该都懂，主要是写给钻石及以下看的 姜子牙的被动提供经验加成，可以抢2抢4，套路好就是出门3人一起吃中线到2然后一起反红或者反蓝，通常是反红 姜子牙的一技能提供5秒的减速，最高达到百分之90，配合二技能和中野抓人无往不利 姜子牙的二技能强制位移配合1技能使用并且探草丛很强 大招主要左右封走位便于队友技能命中，R闪威力强大 在做出鞋子或者1个大件的时候，把辅助宝石升级为救赎之翼 也可以出CD鞋，抵抗鞋，护甲鞋，不推荐出法穿鞋 铭文：调和，心眼/怜悯/献祭/虚空，梦魇/圣人 后期可以换成法穿棒，鞋子可以换成复活甲辉月 一般来说不用出肉，当然也可以出冰心 孙膑 孙斌：楼主心中的版本最强辅助，一技能的POKE减速，二技能的加快节奏和团战的大量回血，大招的先手沉默和高伤害，低中高都可以拿来上分，只要炸弹丢的准，二技能时机把握的好，孙斌就是是个恶心的存在 铭文同姜子牙 辅助装推荐升级奔狼或者救赎 孙斌要出一些法强装备保证输出，如果家里有出救赎的关羽就别出主动辅助装，出个近卫荣耀 补充：孙斌召唤师技能推荐闪现，也可以用治疗 这是中单孙膑的出装，高端局仅次于诸葛亮的存在 如果家里打野能给蓝就不用出圣杯，在最后一件补出复活甲并和辉月换着用 张飞 张飞：最强反手没有之一，开大的一瞬间是无敌状态，再次强调不要出红莲斗篷，什么草丛都可以占，只要来人就一技能击退，二技能撤出 ^值得注意的是逆风局或在没有大招的情况下不要二技能探草丛，就算有大招也尽量别，除非大优势 ^大招并不是只有自己被打残才开，如果对面有人切入后排可以直接开 ^尽量不要先手开大，要学会反手 ^先手开大只有一种情况就是上高地 前两套正常出装，第三套大顺风用，辅助装救赎或者奔狼，如果家里没有射手就不要出救赎，出奔狼配合双战士边路反打无敌 铭文首推：宿命调和虚空 不祥征兆的小件可以拖到出完魔女和辅助装再补，就算被削了性价比还是高 召唤师技能一定带治疗，不要带晕眩，也别带干扰，更别带什么闪现终结 先把鞋子补出来再出大件，另外张飞不要出近卫荣耀，要出就出救赎奔狼，极影也可以能给自己加攻速，如果上单是出救赎的关羽可以出近卫荣耀 这里顺便提一下辅助不吃经济，你带着百穿铭文玩孙斌其实问题都不大 大乔 大乔：团战的节奏带动者，要求实用者高度意识和判断力，明确什么时候该干什么 出门点一技能奔中路帮中单清兵，但是不要和中单分钱 前期跟着打野走，让射手单线发育，跟射手沟通好不急着推塔，等打野来抓对面上单再推不迟， 跟打野沟通好及时开龙 必要时开大保被抓的队友撤退 不要在龙坑开大，尽量在龙坑旁边，不然团队会受到不知名的AOE容易一波崩 出装类似孙斌，不用出面具，不推荐护甲鞋除非有猴子，不推荐CD鞋，大乔没有孙斌那么吃减CD 大后期尽量补出辉月，在二技能里开辉月走不了算我输 召唤师技能：闪现、治疗 如果在大后期被先手强开，就在远处放个圈，然后拼手速开大，闪现进去，然后点开辉月，等满血再传回来，配合队友反打 牛魔 牛魔，关键是控制技能要打的准，蹲草丛先手强开有奇效 如果蹲草丛抓人，一定要大招先手，然后再二技能，如果先2技能起手对面会散开，不要舍不得大招 大闪朝人堆砸中三个以上，这波团基本稳了 二技能的伤害不俗，目标主要是对面的刺客和战士 尽量和C位不要太远，自己的被动加双抗别忘了 守高地可以直接用大排兵线，强上高地最好有闪现的时候再大闪强上 辅助装首推奔狼，其次救赎，不推荐近卫荣耀除非有救赎关羽，极影还是不太需要 铭文最好是 宿命调和虚空 治疗可以带，晕眩用处不大，牛魔大招封路和减速自然重要，但能直接击飞更好吧?大闪逆风也是很容易一波翻盘的好嘛，R闪能拍起来三个后排很难被秒，如果被秒就是他太菜了 简单来说如果对自己操作不自信就带治疗，如果有自信3闪2控住多人强开就带闪现，毕竟要相信后排的操作还有一定自保能力的 鬼谷子 鬼谷子，中后期如果小地图上没人，除非对面是刚刚死过人，不然什么都不要想直接开大，尤其是对面上单没死却没露头的时候 多配合打野抓人，如果使用不熟练二技能可以靠近以后再开，如果使用熟练就把握好时间提前开进去就拉 基本连招32A12配合打野强势入侵，如果距离较远，连招就是312A控住，然后让自己扛一些伤害，打野后手进场 如果是保护后排就一技能起手，等对面切入以后先开大保后排走位，然后用二技能留住并配合队友击杀对面战士和刺客 可以出五速鞋打更快的节奏，辅助装一定要出奔狼纹章，除非对面李白猴子肥的无敌，不然救赎近卫极影统统不出 调和 梦魇 虚空/怜悯/献祭 鬼谷子大招不仅仅是群体隐身，更重要的是开最近一名英雄的视野，这点非常重要，是鉴别一个鬼谷子好坏的第二标准(第一标准是二技能的准确度) 东皇 前期不要跟着射手，强势配合打野游走别吃经验，到四以后叫上打野直接闪现大强抓对面上单战士或者中单法师，必死，慢慢打开节奏，尽量在15分钟前结束战斗 要敢于越塔大，但是要注意不能被风筝，不要上头 东皇不怕物理英雄，不需要太多护甲，只需要护甲鞋防止射手的远程射，及早做出双魔抗防止法师POKE，魔女斗篷是很重要的装备，防止被提前耗血，我们需要血量对拼 红莲斗篷顺风可以出，不过我是不喜欢，看个人习惯 不要老分钱，尤其不要在射手刷野的时候偷兵线，东皇没想象的那么吃经济 铭文调和虚空宿命，可以带狩猎增加移速 一般来说辅助装还是奔狼好点 东皇不怕战士刺客，所以魔抗很重要，护甲中期不用太高，不需要反甲，冰心可以出 白起 先手开团很强，黏人很强，性质和东皇有一定共同之处，伤害比东皇高很多，肉度比东皇牛魔略低，比鬼谷子略高 一技能是基础，大招是关键，二技能是精髓 大招强开前在后排脚下放个二技能可以防止自己开大不在的时候被切入 技能可以带闪现治疗晕眩，不推荐终结 定位和东皇相似，推荐双魔抗，反甲也是很必要出的装备 红莲斗篷可以出，不过也是那句话楼主不喜欢，但是出了红莲反甲可以缓一缓后期再出 下个版本红莲改了基本是要出的 辅助装推荐奔狼，也可以救赎 铭文 调和虚空宿命 第二套在魔女之前或之后也可以补个守护者之凯，第三套也都可以 这就是小编为大家带来的王者荣耀s9辅助的玩法攻略，大家都学会了吗？

thread.title_full: 【图片】大家都在说的“高级感穿搭”，让你的新家也轻松拥有高逼格！【揭阳吧】_百度贴吧

posts.author: 珍珠丸子炸碉堡
posts.title: 【图片】大家都在说的“高级感穿搭”，让你的新家也轻松拥有高逼格！【揭阳吧】_百度贴吧
posts.text:
时尚博主们都在争相教粉丝们如何穿得有“高级感”——衣服的面料、颜色、款式，每一种搭配都有讲究。
穿的要有高级感，我们的爱巢同样可以有“高级感”！
懂得居家的人，只花10万元就能打造出100万元的装修效果；而不懂审美的人，或许砸进去100万元，也会把家装修成10万元的效果；那么，如何能不花冤枉钱又让装修显得有“高级感”呢？
一、大胆使用高级深色
但很多人都会发现，一些高级豪宅的装饰装修都是大大的落地窗、5米的超高层高、一个大厅只放一把椅子 “房子面积总共也就100来平方米，怎么舍得浪费，还要想着老人来了怎么住、孩子练琴去哪儿合适，所以如何才能用最省钱的办法，让家里看起来有大house那种高级感呢？”
这里名匠装饰设计师有些不错的建议，如果室内采光好，可以在墙面上做文章。墙面使用深灰、暗紫、墨绿、藏蓝、暗红色，可以是漆，也可以是铺贴纯色壁纸，刷满整间屋，大基调压下来，一进入房间就能感到显贵。
如果室内采光不太好，可以选择深色地板、地砖，墙面可以选一面或两面墙做深色，其他墙面刷白色提亮，家具也可以选择深色。
需要注意的是，白色墙面必须是纯白色，不要刷成米白、浅黄、浅粉色，这类颜色显得温馨、清新、年轻，但不会显得贵气。
二、使用更“贵”的材料
墙面大基调定下来后，开始做室内造型，此时建材的选择非常重要。就像衣服的面料一样，纯棉、亚麻、混纺棉布是不能带给人高级感的，而丝绸、天鹅绒、高支棉等布料，给人高级、贵气的感觉。自带高级感的建材，常见的有纯实木、石材、皮质等。
纯实木可以用作实木地板、实木家具、实木墙面装饰等。木材颜色有很多种，有黄棕色系、红棕色系、灰白色系等。
灰白色系的木材，不够新、不够豪华；
红棕色系的木材如果搭配不好容易显得略俗；
如果选择黄棕色系、琥珀色的实木木材，显得稳重、新鲜，通过调整不一样颜色深浅，就能完美营造出或时尚或稳重的观感，用的面积越大越容易出效果。
如果装修预算充足的家庭，还可考虑除地板、柜子外，选择木饰面板上墙，这比壁纸、墙漆显得更为高级。墙面装饰的木板不需要拼花，也不需要窄木板，大、宽、长的木板即可。
还有一种更为贵气的建材——石材。石材能将整个居家风格提高档次，但注意不要使用米黄色石材。这种颜色已过时，容易让人联想到年久失修的招待所、酒店。
三、家具跟着大牌买
室内装修是否高级、入时，与家具的相关度超过八成。
可以在装修前先去看看顶级品牌家居店，然后再根据设计师的建议和提供的方案去自己能承受的品牌和价位中，挑选几款显得高级感、有质感的家具。
家具主要考虑色彩是否能和居室背景相协调，室内背景的颜色与灯光是搭配的主要方向。
如按照上述方式，居室的背景色调较浓重，一般而言不宜选择色调过于深沉的家具，容易形成沉重昏暗的室内气氛。另外，如家具的色彩过于强烈，不耐看，容易产生疲累的视觉效果，所以，选择调和性的色彩更合适。

posts.author: segre_lleida
posts.title: Chourraut i Craviotto, guardonats amb el Premi Nacional de l'Esport
posts.text:
Chourraut i Craviotto, guardonats amb el Premi Nacional de l'Esport REDACCIÓ Segrià 
El piragüista lleidatà Saúl Craviotto, l’halterofilista Lidia Valentín i la palista Maialen Chourraut, establerta a la Seu , van ser guardonats ahir amb el Premi Nacional de l’Esport als millors esportistes masculí i femení espanyols del 2016. L’alcalde de Lleida, Àngel Ros, va felicitar Craviotto i va destacar-ne l’“extraordinària trajectòria”. 
Segons la decisió del jurat, reunit ahir al Consell Superior d’Esports (CSD) i presidit per Jaime González Castaño, director general d’Esports del CSD, Craviotto rebrà el Premi Rei Felip a l’esportista espanyol que més es va distingir durant el 2016 , al guanyar dos medalles olímpiques: un or amb Cristian Toro al K-2 200 metres i un bronze al K-1 200 metres. Quant a la millor esportista femenina , el Premi Reina Letícia va ser ex aequo per a Lidia Valentín i Maialen Chourraut , que van fer història a Rio amb les respectives medalles, un bronze en halterofília i un or en K-1 d’aigües braves. 
El piragüisme és el gran premiat en aquesta edició , ja que els nombrosos èxits en els últims Jocs, amb quatre medalles, faran que l’equip olímpic sigui guardonat amb la Copa Baró de Güell al millor combinat, mentre que Marcus Cooper, or olímpic en K-1 1.000 metres, es va emportar el Premi Rei Joan Carles per ser la revelació més significativa. A més a més, el Premi Infanta Sofia és per a la nadadora Teresa Perales , guanyadora de vint-i-sis medalles paralímpiques.

posts.text:
Build up your vocabulary through reading
A plausible case can be made for the view that personal values influence which things in the environment a person attends to. Obviously, a person cannot look in all directions at once, and I will not choose to look at the same things you choose to look at. But an extension of the principle was made by those perceptionists who argued that personal values not only orient perception, but actually distort it. I distrust the generalization that perception is typically distorted, because I think the biological need for clear perception is so great that evolution would have weeded out such a tendency. However, the argument does appear to have some bearing on the study of perception in general.

thread.section_title: Premium
thread.title: The BBC may feel threatened by Netflix and Amazon, but Sky doesn't
thread.title_full: The BBC may feel threatened by Netflix and Amazon, but Sky doesn't

posts.author: Gary Davey
posts.title: The BBC may feel threatened by Netflix and Amazon, but Sky doesn't
posts.text:
T he golden age of television is just getting started. There has never been a better time for it. But not according to the BBC. In a speech on Thursday, Tony Hall, the BBC director-general, said the entire UK production industry was facing a significant threat thanks to the arrival of competition from streaming platforms like Netflix and Amazon.
If anything, the exact opposite is true. What he sees as a threat, I see as an opportunity.
Yes, their arrival has shaken up the British television industry, but it has given customers more choice, and handed British writers, producers and production staff even more opportunities, free to make shows for a global audience. The pond may be bigger, but Britain is a very big fish – and it is still growing.
The BBC’s prediction of a £500m deficit in original UK content spend is rather bizarre. With a guaranteed income for the next decade it clearly cannot...

thread.title_full: Bastei Lübbe AG, DE000A1X3YY0

posts.author: redaktion@ad-hoc-news.de
posts.title: Bastei Lübbe AG, DE000A1X3YY0
posts.text:
Pressemitteilung 
Bastei Lübbe AG: Außerplanmäßige Abschreibung bei der Tochtergesellschaft oolipo AG belastet Ergebnis im 2. Quartal 
Köln, 7. November 2017. Die Bastei Lübbe AG (ISIN DE000A1X3YY0) gibt bekannt, dass die mit hohem finanziellen Aufwand entwickelte Streaming-Plattform für Leseinhalte oolipo die erwarteten und notwendigen Nutzerzahlen bislang bei Weitem nicht erreicht hat. Gleichzeitig verlief die Suche nach neuen Investoren, um die notwendige Weiterentwicklung der Plattform voranzutreiben, bisher erfolglos. Im Einvernehmen mit dem Aufsichtsrat hat sich der Vorstand der Bastei Lübbe AG daher entschlossen, keine weiteren Mittel in das Projekt zu investieren und eine außerplanmäßige Abschreibung vorzunehmen. 
Diese nicht liquiditätswirksame Abschreibung auf die immateriellen Vermögenswerte an der Tochtergesellschaft oolipo AG wird das Konzern-EBIT im 2. Quartal des laufenden Geschäftsjahres in einer Größenordnung von rund EUR 3 Mio. außerordentlich belasten. Der Vorstand prüft in den nächsten Monaten die Möglichkeit, die entwickelte Technologie anderweitig zu verwenden oder zu verwerten. 
Das Vorstandsteam der Bastei Lübbe AG unter Führung des Vorstandsvorsitzenden Carel Halff wird in den kommenden Monaten die strategische Ausrichtung des Konzerns insgesamt detailliert auf operative Chancen und Risiken hin analysieren und in enger Abstimmung mit dem Aufsichtsrat die Geschäftsstrategie fortschreiben bzw. anpassen. 
Über die Bastei Lübbe AG: Die Bastei Lübbe AG ist eine international agierende Mediengruppe mit Sitz in Köln. Die Geschäftstätigkeit fokussiert sich auf die Entwicklung und Lizensierung von Inhalten, die physisch und digital weltweit vertrieben werden. Zum Kerngeschäft des Unternehmens gehören im Segment "Buch" das klassische Verlagsgeschäft sowie die periodisch erscheinenden Rätsel- und Romanhefte. Mit seinen insgesamt zwölf Verlagen und Imprints hat die Unternehmensgruppe derzeit rund 3.600 Titel aus den Bereichen Belletristik, Sach- sowie Kinder- und Jugendbuch im Angebot. Im wachsenden Segment der Hardcover-Belletristik ist das Unternehmen seit vielen Jahren Marktführer in Deutschland. Gleichzeitig ist Bastei Lübbe Innovationstreiber im Bereich digitaler Medien. Neben der Produktion von tausenden Audio- und eBooks gehören zum Unternehmensbereich "Digital" auch die Beteiligungen an der Selfpublishing-Plattform "BookRix" und dem renommierten Game-Publisher "Daedalic Entertainment". Vervollständigt wird die digitale Wertschöpfungskette der Bastei Lübbe AG durch die Beteiligung am Onlineshop "beam-ebooks.de". 
Mit einem Jahresumsatz von rund 146,3 Millionen Euro (Geschäftsjahr 2016/2017) ist die Bastei Lübbe AG das größte mittelständische Familienunternehmen im Verlagswesen in Deutschland. Seit 2013 sind die Aktien des Unternehmens im Prime Standard der Frankfurter Wertpapierbörse notiert (WKN A1X3YY, ISIN DE000A1X3YY0). Weitere Informationen sind unter www.luebbe.de zu finden. thread.section_title: Philippines News Agency Tacloban Bureau
thread.title: Livelihood, water still top concerns of ‘Yolanda’ survivors
thread.title_full: Livelihood, water still top concerns of ‘Yolanda’ survivors

posts.author: sarwell (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Livelihood, water still top concerns of ‘Yolanda’ survivors
posts.text:
TACLOBAN CITY, Nov. 7  – Four years after Super Typhoon Yolanda ravaged this city, livelihood and water scarcity still bother thousands of survivors transferred to northern resettlement sites.

Rex Gabrinao, 38, who used to earn up to PHP1,000 daily from fishing before the killer typhoon struck, has been driving a tricycle in the northern part of the city these past two years, earning only PHP200 to PHP300 a day.

“Although my wife and I don’t have children, we have to survive our hand-to-mouth existence every day,” said Gabrinao, one of the recipients of the 33-sq. meter concrete house built by the National Housing Authority (NHA) in San Roque village.

Another housing recipient, Maria Cristina Emnas, 22, said her husband’s earning from fishing had drastically dropped due to high transportation costs.

“He has to spend PHP60 to PHP70 for fare daily to fish in San Jose from our new house. Before Yolanda struck, he just walked a few steps from our house to the shoreline,” Emnas shared.

Tacloban City Mayor Cristina G. Romualdez said the local government has been conducting livelihood training courses in partnership with national government agencies to help jobless and low-income families.

The National Economic and Development Authority (NEDA) confirmed on Monday that as of the first half of 2017, several projects under the livelihood cluster had not yet begun in Eastern Visayas.

In terms of transportation, the Office of the Presidential Assistant for the Visayas has provided six buses for the use of relocated families. The free ride for workers and students has been around for more than a year, but thousands have to take public transportation due to limited bus seats.

For Evangeline Sanchez, 40, another main concern is water supply.

Their family of six, she said, only gets an allocation of five jugs or about 10 liters daily for shower, toilet, laundry, and cooking. Their family buys drinking water at PHP30 per jug.

The family gets water from delivery trucks of the Department of Public Works and Highways, the city government, the Leyte Metropolitan Water District, and some private contractors.

“Five jugs daily are not enough for all of us. In days without water rations, we are forced to buy water from private water delivery services,” Sanchez added.

NEDA Regional Director Bonifacio Uy said that under the medium-term water supply project for Tacloban’s northern resettlement areas, water trucks would be awarded to Tacloban before the year ends. Bidding for the civil works component of the project was held last July 20.

Plans and approved budget contract for the long-term water supply project is still being finalized for presentation in the procurement conference.

“The schedule of the conference is still subject to the completion of all necessary documents,” Uy added.

Both projects are being implemented by the Local Water Utilities Administration (LWUA), a state-run corporation based in Quezon City. LWUA has no office in the provinces.

The government targets to move 14,000 families to the resettlement sites by next year, according to Romualdez.

As of end October, more than 9,000 families have already been transferred from danger zones to their new homes. (SQM/With reports from Ali Krause Gamana, Mikaela Angelica Ramirez & Christine Quimbo, OJTs/PNA)

ΠΑΡΑΣΤΑΣΕΙΣ – ΠΡΟΒΟΛΕΣ • 6 τελευταίες παραστάσεις του έργου «4 λεπτά και 12 δευτερόλεπτα» σε σκηνοθεσία Μιχάλη Βιρβιδάκη από την Εταιρεία Θεάτρου ΜΝΗΜΗ. Οι παραστάσεις θα δοθούν στο θέατρο Κυδωνία την Παρασκευή 10, το Σάββατο 11 και την Κυριακή 12 καθώς και την Παρασκευή 17, το Σάββατο 18 και την Κυριακή 19 Νοεμβρίου στις 9.30 μμ. • Θεατρική παράσταση “Στους Αστερισμούς” από την ομάδα “Ανατολή”, στα Χανιά. Παραστάσεις θα πραγματοποιηθούν στο “Μεγάλο Ο” (οδός Γρηγορίου Ε’ 69) τις Παρασκευές του Νοεμβρίου 10,17 και 24 Νοεμβρίου στις 22.00 το βράδυ. Γενική είσοδος 8 ευρώ. Η παράσταση είναι κατάλληλη άνω των 16 ετών. • Τέσσερις κινηματογραφικές αναπαραστάσεις για το δεύτερο παγκόσμιο πόλεμο, θα γίνουν τον Νοέμβριο στον χώρο της κατάληψης “Rosa Nera” στον Λόφο Καστέλι στην παλιά πόλη. Οι προβολές θα γίνονται κάθε Πέμπτη βράδυ. • Η θεατρική παράσταση «Και του καιρού και πάντα» στην Τοπική Κοινότητα Μάλεμε δήμου Πλατανιά και συγκεκριμένα στο Πολιτιστικό Κέντρο Μάλεμε (Παραπλεύρως Εκκλησίας Αγίου Αντωνίου) το Σάββατο 11 Νοεμβρίου στις 7:30 μ.μ Η είσοδος είναι ελεύθερη. • “ Τα κανούργια ρούχα του βασιλιά” στο Κιν/θέατρο Ελληνίς το Σάββατο 11 Νοεμβρίου στις 11.30 και στις 17.30 από το Μικρό Θέατρο Λάρισας. posts.author: Filomena Fotia
posts.title: AIDAA: nei cimiteri vivono oltre 50.000 animali
posts.text: Video AIDAA: nei cimiteri vivono oltre 50.000 animali "Sono oltre 5.000 i cimiteri italiani censiti da AIDAA dove sono presenti colonie di animali che hanno deciso di vivere in pace tra le tombe"   09:51 Pensando ai cimiteri spesso si pensa a luoghi tetri ed ovviamente alla morte, invece, si spiega in una nota “ è provato che i cimiteri spesso si sono trasformati per molti animali in altrettanti luoghi sicuri dove vivere. Sono oltre 5.000 i cimiteri italiani censiti da AIDAA dove sono presenti colonie di animali che hanno deciso di vivere in pace tra le tombe, moltissimi sono i cimiteri italiani (Il Verano di Roma e quello di Brindisi tra i piu famosi) dove sono presenti delle imponenti e stanziali colonie feline, ma in realtà la maggior parte dei cimiteri italiani ospita colonie di leprotti o di altri piccoli animali del bosco a partire dai cimiteri Maggiore e Chiaravalle a Milano, mentre in quasi tutti i cimiteri del centro-nord Italia è possibile alzando gli occhi al cielo vedere correre tra i rami degli alberi gli scoiattoli grigi, ma anche i ghiri. Mentre nelle antiche tombe di famiglia a volte rovinate dal tempo trovano casa spesso colonie di pippistrelli. Secondo una stima approssimativa ma non troppo potrebbero infatti essere oltre 50.000 gli animali di varie specie che popolano gli oltre 5.000 cimiteri italiani .”   09:51 07.11.17

posts.author: Việt Báo
posts.title: Daihatsu DN Multisix: Xem trước Avanza thế hệ kế tiếp
posts.text:
Mazda Vision Coupe: Hình ảnh sơ khởi Mazda6 mới 
Daihatsu MPV DN Multisix concept mới đây lại được giới thiệu tới công chúng Nhật Bản tại triển lãm Tokyo Motor Show 2017. Trước đó, mẫu xe này đã được ra mắt tại triển lãm GIIAS 2017 diễn ra ở Indonesia vào tháng 8/2017. 
MPV Daihatsu DN Multisix sở hữu chiều dài 4.310mm, rộng 1.720mm, cao 1.695mm, chiều dài cơ sở là 2.620mm và khoảng sáng gầm 250mm. 
Ngoại thất của của MPV DN Multisix nổi bật với cụm đèn pha LED sắc sảo kéo dài sâu vào thân xe, lưới tản nhiệt lớn màu đen bóng được phân cách thành hai phần bằng một đường viền kim loại sáng chạy ngang qua nối liền hai cụm đèn trước, trong khi phần cản trước mở rộng. Dù là một chiếc MPV nhưng diện mạo bên ngoài của DN Multisix lại mang dáng vẻ của một chiếc SUV mạnh mẽ, xe có 6 chỗ ngồi (bố trí kiểu ngồi dạng 2 + 2 + 2) thay vì 7. 
Nội thất xe mang hơi hướng tương lai với toàn bộ khu vực bảng điều khiển bằng kính dạng nổi, vô-lăng kiểu hai chấu khá đơn giản, ghế ngồi bọc da trắng, phần thân ghế dập nổi dạng kim cương. Hiện thông số về khả năng vận hành trang bị trên xe chưa được Daihatsu tiết lộ thêm thông tin. 
Nhiều khả năng đây chính là bản thiết kế sơ khởi của chiếc Toyota Avanza thế hệ kế tiếp. Mẫu MPV cỡ nhỏ này do Daihatsu thiết kế và mang lại thành công cho Toyota ở những thị trường đang phát triển. Vừa qua, Avanza cũng được đưa về Việt Nam trưng bày và sẽ bán ra trong tương lai gần. VietBao.vn Thích và chia sẻ bài viết này trên facebook Theo dõi vietbao.vn trên facebook Tìm hiểu:

thread.title_full: Новостройки Новой Москвы не подорожали и не подешевели за три месяца – «НДВ»

posts.title: Новостройки Новой Москвы не подорожали и не подешевели за три месяца – «НДВ»
posts.text:
Жилье, руб/кв.м. 166 110 +0,2% Жилье, $/кв.м. 2 861 -0,6% Курс USD 58,43 +0,6% Курс EUR 68,08 +0,6% Наш научный партнер Новости недвижимости 11:18 Квартиры в ЖК Рассказово Дома сданы, идет заселение! 850 м от метро Рассказовка. Своя развитая инфраструктура. Выгодная ипотека! от 4,7 млн руб. Sezar Group Застройщик: Красный Октябрь, ООО. Проектная декларация на рекламируемом сайте Новостройки Новой Москвы не подорожали и не подешевели за три месяца – «НДВ» 
По итогам третьего квартала средняя стоимость квадратного метра на первичном рынке Новой Москвы не претерпела существенных изменений. Новостройки сохранили прежний ценовой уровень, прибавив к предыдущему значению всего 0,3%, подсчитали в компании «НДВ - Недвижимость». 
Согласно данным компании, на протяжении всего года наблюдалась положительная динамика: средняя стоимость квадратного метра перешагнула отметку на уровне 100 000 руб. еще во втором квартале 2017 года, и сейчас данное значение стабильно сохраняется. 
Отмечается, что внутри сегментов новостроек прирост показали новостройки класса эконом и комфорт. По итогам третьего квартала показатель увеличился на 0,4% и 0,8% соответственно. Средняя цена реализации самых доступных проектов составила 79,8 тыс. руб. за «квадрат», новостроек уровня комфорт- 103 тыс. руб. за квадратный метр. В бизнес-сегменте было зафиксировано небольшое снижение (- 0,7%): стоимость квадратного метра в результате составила 132,9 тыс. руб. за квадратный метр. 
Объем предложения новостроек на территории Новой Москвы вырос на 4,3%. Как подсчитали аналитики, по итогам третьего квартала началась реализация шести новых корпусах в двух проектах комфорт-класса. При этом на протяжении последних трех кварталов общее количество реализуемых объектов снижалось, что во многом стало причиной положительной ценовой динамики. 
В структуре предложения доли НАОи ТАО существенно не изменились. В Новомосковском округе реализуется 76% всех новостроек Новой Москвы (+1% относительно второго квартала), в Троицком – 24% (-1%.) Средняя стоимость квадратного метра составила 106 тыс. руб. и 84,6 тыс. руб. соответственно. 
Доля наиболее доступного предложения (50-80 тыс. руб. за кв. м) составляет почти четверть предложения. Относительно второго квартала прирост составил 1% (до 24% в общей структуре). На новостройки со средней ценой реализации от 80 до 110 тыс. руб. за кв. м приходится около 42% (+1%), а на объекты в диапазоне 110-140 тыс. руб. за м2 – 29% (-1%). Доля самого дорогого предложения составляет 5% (+1%). 
Отмечается, что большинство новостроек Новой Москвы реализуется по договорам долевого участия (77,1%). Доля купли-продажи составляет порядка 22,4%, и всего 0,6% приходится на иные схемы. thread.title: На спутнике Сатурна найден источник жизни
thread.title_full: На спутнике Сатурна найден источник жизни

posts.title: На спутнике Сатурна найден источник жизни
posts.text:
Международная группа астрономов выяснила, что на Энцеладе существуют все необходимые для зарождения жизни условия. National Aeronautics & Space Adm / Globallookpress.com 
Согласно выводам исследователей, на спутнике Сатурна имеется гидротермальная активность, которая возникает из-за приливного трения между водой и ядром луны. Это, в свою очередь, обеспечивает энергией гипотетические живые организмы. Статья ученых опубликована в журнале Nature Astronomy. 
На Энцеладе существует огромный соленый океан, скрытый ледяной корой толщиной в 1-25 километров. В него не проникают солнечные лучи, обеспечивающие на Земле фотосинтез и образование большей части биомассы. Однако энергию в виде минеральных веществ могут поставлять гидротермальные источники, находящиеся на морском дне. Для существования последних необходимо наличие горячего ядра. 
Ученые полагали, что источником тепла в недрах Энцелада может быть радиоактивный распад. Однако этот механизм мог работать лишь на протяжении нескольких миллионов лет, что было бы недостаточным для появления жизни. 
Исследователи создали компьютерную модель, которая показала, что приливные силы, возникающие из-за движения спутника по эллиптической орбите вокруг Сатурна, могут нагревать воду внутри ядра луны. Это происходит из-за трения, возникающего при циркуляции жидкости в пористых породах. Температура воды повышается и при достижении 90 градусов Цельсия она выталкивается в океан у полюсов Энцелада, а затем выбрасывается в космос виде ледяных гейзеров. 
Такой механизм мог бы работать в течение миллиардов лет, что может быть достаточным для образования живых организмов, сообщает Lenta.ru .

thread.title: «Ростелеком» лишил управленцев бонусов почти на 1 млрд рублей
thread.title_full: «Ростелеком» лишил управленцев бонусов почти на 1 млрд рублей

posts.author: Анастасия Ольденбургская
posts.title: «Ростелеком» лишил управленцев бонусов почти на 1 млрд рублей
posts.text:
вкл выкл 
ПАО «Ростелеком» принял решение лишить менеджеров высшего и среднего звена бонусов на 980 млн рублей, которые оператор потратил на выкуп собственных обыкновенных акций в III квартале текущего года. 
Управленцы «Ростелекома» не смогли достичь запланированных ключевых показателей эффективности, в связи с чем средства пошли на выкуп акций, сообщает газета «Ведомости» . 
Согласно условиям бонусной программы «Ростелекома», вознаграждение, которое получает менеджмент, можно потратить исключительно на приобретение акций своей компании. При выплатах учитывается наличие свободного денежного потока, показатели чистой прибыли и рентабельность инвестированного капитала (ROIC). 
Если бы KPI был перевыполнен, менеджеры могли бы выкупить до 1,5% уставного капитала компании. Однако, по данным издания, ROIC составил всего 83,5% от базового прогноза. 
«Ростелеком» не стал разглашать стоимость акций для внутреннего спроса. 
Ранее, сообщал портал iz.ru, «Ростелеком» должен был объявить финансовые результаты по итогам III квартала 2017 года по данным консолидированной отчетности по стандартам МСФО. ПОДРОБНЕЕ ПО ТЕМЕ

thread.title: Soccer-Moyes appointment a leap of faith by West Ham owners
thread.title_full: Soccer-Moyes appointment a leap of faith by West Ham owners - The Economic Times

posts.author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
posts.title: Soccer-Moyes appointment a leap of faith by West Ham owners
posts.text:
By Neil Robinson
Nov 7 (Reuters) - David Moyes begins his new job as West Ham United manager intent on reviving his floundering career by resuscitating a club mired in relegation trouble.
Many observers view the 54-year-old former Everton manager as fortunate to get another chance to prove himself after being sacked from his past three jobs at Manchester United, Real Sociedad and Sunderland, who were relegated from the Premier League last season after losing 26 of his 38 games in charge.
It was his demeanour and his record that was held against him and Moyes appeared to get his excuses in early by predicting Sunderland faced a difficult season after their second game.
But the Black Cats' current plight -- they are bottom of the second-tier Championship -- suggests their problems are more structural and West Ham's owners have looked beyond that unhappy spell in charge to appoint a highly experienced coach who knows he may not get another chance if West Ham fail to stay up.
British newspapers reported that Moyes' case has been pushed by West Ham's director of player recruitment, Tony Henry, who worked with the Scot at Everton where he forged his reputation as a manager capable enough in his 11 years in charge to attract Manchester United when Alex Ferguson retired in 2013.
A banner declaring Moyes "The Chosen One" did him no favours during an insipid season in charge at Old Trafford and his subsequent spell at Real Sociedad also ended in disappointment, with the Spanish Liga club flirting with relegation.
Now he faces a similar fight at West Ham, with little in Saturday's 4-1 home defeat by Liverpool - Slaven Bilic's final game in charge - to offer immediate hope of a revival.

RELEGATION ZONE
Everton's 3-2 comeback win over Watford on Sunday dropped West Ham into 18th place, with nine points from 11 games.
But the malaise goes deeper than results, with the Hammers appearing an unhappy club struggling with the legacy of leaving Upton Park for the London Stadium at the start of last season, a move that many supporters blame for their present troubles.
While Bilic lost one of his 17 games in charge at the old ground, West Ham have been beaten 11 times in 24 matches in their new home.
West Ham striker Andy Carroll criticised fans for leaving early on Saturday and Moyes will face a major job galvanising the club's traditionally raucous support if they are to avoid their first releagation since 2011.
Like Crystal Palace, who earlier this term turned to another seasoned manager in 70-year-old Roy Hodgson, the Hammers believe Moyes has the Premier League nous to turn their fortunes around.
The Scot, who has also been touted as a possible manager of his national team, signalled his intention to return to the Premier League at the weekend when he first became linked with the West Ham post.
"For me to get back in it means another manager is going to have to lose their job and I wouldn't wish that on anybody," he said on beIN Sports.
"He (Bilic) must be hating it and wanting to get a result as soon as he can. So if it becomes available, yes, but at the moment it's not available."
Asked if he might be managing again after the forthcoming international break, he added: "I really don't know. I hope so."
Now he has his chance with a team who have underperformed, with many observers questioning the wisdom of their close season transfer dealings as they paid top prices for ageing players, the 24 million pounds ($31.48 million) paid to Stoke City for 28-year-old Marko Arnautovic being a prime example.
No more transfer dealings can be done until the window opens in January so Moyes must work with what he has until then. Both manager and team need to learn how to win again, which makes his appointment an intriguing leap of faith by the owners.
($1 = 0.7623 pounds) (Reporting by Neil Robinson; Editing by Ken Ferris)
(This story has not been edited by economictimes.com and is auto–generated from a syndicated feed we subscribe to.) 0 Comments

posts.author: redaktion@ad-hoc-news.de
posts.title: Aramea Asset Management AG,
posts.text:
Teilen Teilen 
Hamburg, den 7. November 2017 
Die Aramea Fonds Familie hat erneut Zuwachs bekommen: Nach der engen Kooperation mit dem erfolgreichen Small-Cap-Spezialisten Apus Capital konnte mit FRAM Capital ein ausgewiesener Spezialist für die Aktienanlage bei unseren nördlichen Nachbarn eingebunden werden. Zum 01. Oktober 2017 wurde der Aktienfonds FRAM Capital Skandinavien (ISIN DE000A2DTLZ2) aufgelegt, der einen vermögensverwaltenden Ansatz verfolgt und zu mindestens 51% in Aktien investiert, deren Emittenten ihren Hauptsitz in Skandinavien haben. Die Auswahl der Titel erfolgt nach fundamentalen Kriterien. Beraten wird der Fonds von Florian Romacker, FRAM Capital, der über 25 Jahre Berufserfahrung hat und zudem viele Jahre in leitender Funktion bei skandinavischen Investmentbanken im Aktienbereich tätig war. Florian Romacker hat im Laufe dieser Zeit das Management der meisten skandinavischen Firmen persönlich kennengelernt. 
Skandinavien ist wirtschaftlich stabil und weist eine geringe Verschuldung auf. Norwegen investiert seine durch den Ölreichtum erzielten Überschüsse in den Staatsfonds (mit einem Volumen von ca. 1000 Milliarden USD), und Schweden überlegt aktuell ebenfalls einen Staatsfonds aufzulegen, um unter anderem die Liquidität der schwedischen Staatsanleihen zu erhöhen. Norwegen und Schweden haben unabhängige Zentralbanken und steuern ihre eigenen Währungen. 
In vielen Sektoren wie Informationstechnologie, Medizintechnik, Verpackungstechnologie, Logistik und Ölförderung haben skandinavische Firmen eine herausragende Stellung. 
Skandinavien hat eine deutlich ausgeprägtere Aktienkultur als zum Beispiel Deutschland. Firmen werden viel öfter und früher an die Börse gebracht. Dies ermöglicht Investoren häufig zu einem frühen Zeitpunkt in interessante Wachstumsunternehmen zu investieren, an denen die Gründer zumeist noch einen signifikanten Anteil halten. Davon profitiert auch der Investor. So konnten skandinavische Aktien seit 2004 über 10 % Rendite p.a. erzielen, während Unternehmen aus dem Euroland durchschnittlich nur 5,8% erwirtschafteten. Insbesondere Small-und Midcaps sind nach Meinung von Florian Romacker interessant, da diese im Durchschnitt eine noch höhere Rendite erzielt haben. 
Über FRAM Capital: FRAM Capital wurde 2017 gegründet und besitzt mit der Auflage des FRAM Capital Skandinavienfonds den einzigen aus Deutschland heraus gemangten Skandinavienfonds. Geschäftsführer ist Florian Romacker. Als Beirat fungiert Dr. Nils Ernst. 
FRAM Capital GmbH Goethestrasse 66 97941 Tauberbischofsheim Telefon: +49 9341 12108 eMail: 
Über ARAMEA Asset Management AG: Aramea Asset Management AG zählt zu den größten unabhängigen Asset Managern Deutschland. Die Gesellschaft verwaltet aktuell mehr als 2,5 Mrd. Euro in 7 Publikums- und 26 Spezialfonds sowie in Vermögensverwaltungsmandaten. Der Kundenkreis umfasst Sozialversicherungsträger, Verbände, Stiftungen, Versicherungen, Banken, Unternehmen, kirchliche Einrichtungen und Family Offices. Der Aufsichtsrat der Gesellschaft besteht neben Rolf Hunck (Vorsitzender) aus den Mitgliedern Dr. Dr. Michael Steen und Gerhard Lenschow. Aramea Asset Management AG wird vertreten durch die Vorstände Markus Barth und Thomas Pergande.

thread.title_full: 27岁北大博士研究生挂职陕西榆林市榆阳区副区长|北大|毕业生|本科_新浪新闻

posts.author: 责任编辑：时鑫
posts.title: 27岁北大博士研究生挂职陕西榆林市榆阳区副区长|北大|毕业生|本科_新浪新闻
posts.text:
原标题：90后小伙挂职榆阳区副区长
近日，陕西榆林市榆阳区政府官网信息公开中，出生于1990年的定边小伙倪志茂，出现在政府领导的副区长一栏中。
据悉，倪志茂是北京大学一名博士研究生，是我省面向北京大学的选调生，按组织程序要求到榆阳区挂职副区长。
根据榆林榆阳区政府官网公开信息显示，倪志茂，男，汉族，1990年5月生，陕西定边人，2008年7月加入中国共产党，2017年8月参加工作，研究生学历。现任榆阳区人民政府副区长。
昨日，华商报记者从榆阳区政府了解到，倪志茂属于省上从高水平大学选调的优秀毕业生，是按组织程序要求到榆阳区挂职副区长，派遣到岗近两个月时间，目前不分管具体工作，只是协助其他区领导的工作。
根据我省2017年度面向北京大学选调优秀毕业生公告，博士研究生按照用人单位需求和本人所学专业选派到省、市、县党政机关工作。到市县工作的，先挂任县（市、区）副职或市级部门副职，2年后经考核优秀且愿意留任的，任副处级职务。
>>知道一下
什么是选调生？
选调生，是各省党委组织部门有计划地从高等院校选调品学兼优的应届大学本科及其以上毕业生到基层工作，作为党政领导干部后备人选和县级以上党政机关高素质的工作人员人选进行重点培养的群体的简称。
哪些人可以报考？
根据中组部有关政策规定，主要是全日制普通高校大学本科及以上学历的优秀应届毕业生，要求是党员、学生干部、应届毕业生，三者条件缺一不可。根据中央有关政策，2011年以来，参加基层服务项目、符合选调生条件的往届高校毕业生（像大学生村干部、“三支一扶”人员等）也可以报考。

posts.author: Riche (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Individual Consultant – UN Staff Stress Counsellor at the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP), Tuesday 7, November 2017
posts.text:
United Nations Development Programme (UNDP), helps developing countries attract and use aid effectively. In all our activities, we encourage the protection of human rights, capacity development and the empowerment of women.

INDIVIDUAL CONSULTANT – UN STAFF STRESS COUNSELLOR 

Type of Contract: Individual Contract

Post Level: National Consultant

Starting Date: 04-Dec-2017

Duration of Initial Contract:1 year within a Long Term Agreement Framework

Expected Duration of Assignment:1 year

RESPONSIBILITIES 

The consultant will be required to the following specific tasks:

Review the already developed training manual on youth and conflict prevention and peacebuilding;

Partake in the technical review session on the manual (date TBD);

Partake in TOT session of the manual (date TBD);

Develop a strategy, in consultation and close collaboration with UNDP and NYSC, for the roll out of the training in an assigned NYSC orientation camp as a pilot case.

Oversee and implement the actual training of youth in the assigned orientation camp;

Compile a lessons learned document from the roll out, to include survey data from youth as end users of the tools;

Liaise with UNDP and the manual formulation consultant to update manual to tailor it to the specific needs of the NYSC and corps members based on the lessons learned document.

Prepare the report of the consultancy to include recommendations/suggestions to improve the training manual and enhancing the partnership between UNDP and NYSC, as well as, advance future training of NYSC members.

REQUIREMENTS 

The consultant should possess Masters or PhD degree in Social Sciences, Law, Conflict Prevention and Peace Studies.

He or she must have cognate experience in teaching at tertiary level or a former lecturer who is now into private practiceor a civil society practitioner with track record and experience in conflict management and peacebuilding with sound training and facilitating skills in the field of conflict management and peacebuilding.

He or she must possess over 15 years of practical experience in conducting trainings of application of peacebuilding and conflict prevention skills.

Knowledge of international best practices in applied education is required, and previous international experience will be considered an asset

TO APPLY 

Applicants should send their complete application to:  icrecruitments.ng@undp.org  only applications with complete supporting documents as stated above and received before or at the closing date will be considered, Applications must be submitted with the email subject: IC- Stress Counsellor.

Application Procedure

Interested individual consultants must submit the following documents/information to demonstrate their qualifications:

Proposal explaining why they are the most suitable for the work. The proposal must demonstrate knowledge of international best practice in relevant fields (such as diplomas, certificates), as well as independently verifiable information (such as evaluations of previous engagements) are to be annexed if they are available.

Personal CV including past experience in similar projects and at least 3 references

Financial proposal:

The financial proposal shall specify a total lump sum amount, and payment terms around specific and measurable (qualitative and quantitative) deliverables (i.e. whether payments fall in installments or upon completion of the entire contract). Payments are based upon input, i.e. a verified number of days worked, and output, i.e. upon delivery of the services specified in the TOR.  In order to assist the requesting unit in the comparison of financial proposals, the financial proposal will include a breakdown of this lump sum amount (including travel, per diems, and number of anticipated working days).

Travel:

All envisaged travel costs must be included in the financial proposal. This includes all travel to join duty station/repatriation travel.  In general, UNDP should not accept travel costs exceeding those of an economy class ticket. Should the IC wish to travel on a higher class he/she should do so using their own resources.

In the case of unforeseeable travel, payment of travel costs including tickets, lodging and terminal expenses should be agreed upon, between the respective business unit and Individual Consultant, prior to travel and will be reimbursed

DUE DATE:  13 November, 2017




Individual Consultant – UN Staff Stress Counsellor at the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP), Tuesday 7, November 2017

thread.title: Intensifying winds could increase east Antarctica's contribution to sea level rise
thread.title_full: Intensifying winds could increase east Antarctica's contribution to sea level rise

posts.title: Intensifying winds could increase east Antarctica's contribution to sea level rise
posts.text:
Intensifying winds could increase east Antarctica's contribution to sea level rise by Staff Writers Austin TX (SPX) Nov 06, 2017 A new study led by the University of Texas Institute for Geophysics has found that wind over the ocean off the coast of East Antarctica causes warm, deep waters to upwell, circulate under Totten Ice Shelf, and melt the fringes of the East Antarctic ice sheet from below. 
Totten Glacier, the largest glacier in East Antarctica, is being melted from below by warm water that reaches the ice when winds over the ocean are strong - a cause for concern because the glacier holds more than 11 feet of sea level rise and acts as a plug that helps lock in the ice of the East Antarctic Ice Sheet. 
Research led by The University of Texas at Austin has found that wind is responsible for bringing warm water to Totten's underbelly, causing the glacier to melt from below. This finding helps answer the question of what causes Totten to speed up some years and slow down in others. Climate change is expected to increase the intensity of winds over the Southern Ocean throughout the next century, and the new findings show that Totten Glacier will probably respond to the changing winds. 
"Totten has been called the sleeping giant because it's huge and has been seen as insensitive to changes in its environment," said lead author Chad Greene, a Ph.D. candidate at the University of Texas Institute for Geophysics (UTIG). "But we've shown that if Totten is asleep, it's certainly not in a coma - we're seeing signs of responsiveness, and it might just take the wind blowing to wake it up." 
The study was published Nov. 1 in the journal Science Advances. UTIG is a research unit of the UT Jackson School of Geosciences. 
The team of researchers found that the glacier speeds up its flow toward the sea when winds over Antarctica's Southern Ocean are strong and pull warm water up from the deep ocean onto the continental shelf in a process called upwelling. Once the warm water reaches the coast, it circulates under the floating portion of the glacier via submarine canyons, melting the edge of the ice sheet from below. When a glacier melts, it thins, weakens and speeds up, letting more landlocked ice drain into the ocean, causing sea levels to rise. 
Wind strength varies from year to year, but greenhouse gases, such as CO2, act like an amplifier to Antarctic coastal winds, boosting their intensity and allowing them to bring up warm water from the depths more frequently. This interplay between climate and wind can lead to sea level rise simply by moving water from one place in the ocean to another, said Greene - no warming of the air, or of ocean temperatures required. 
Upwelling occurs when wind displaces surface water, allowing deeper and warmer water to rise up to replace it. 
"It's like when you blow across a hot bowl of soup and little bits of noodles from the bottom begin to swirl around and rise to the top," said Greene. 
Upwelling can have big impacts around Antarctica, where the deep waters tend to be the warmest (about 5 to 7 degrees Fahrenheit above freezing). The ocean surface is typically near freezing because it's constantly exposed to subzero air temperatures. So when wind pulls warm water up from down deep, the temperature difference experienced at the interface of the water and ice can effectively submerse the glacier in a hot bath, with some areas experiencing more than a 10-fold increase in melt rate. 
The team's study complements an earlier study led by Jason Roberts, a glaciologist with the Australian Antarctic Division at the Antarctic Climate and Ecosystems Cooperative Research Center. Roberts found that when warm water melts Totten from below, it causes the base of the glacier that's usually grounded on the seafloor to float. This unpinning of the glacier can cause the glacier's flow to accelerate, adding more ice into the ocean and contributing to sea level rise. 
"The remaining question was, why do the canyons beneath Totten get flushed with warm water some years and cold water other years?" said Roberts. 
The new study helps answer that question by explaining how wind drives warm water beneath the glacier. By combining satellite images of the ice sheet and wind stress data from observations and computer modeling, Greene and his collaborators were able to study the chain of events that brings the warm water to Totten. That includes modeling the wind-induced upwelling at the edge of the Antarctic continental shelf, the flow of the water through submarine canyons on the continental shelf, and the water reaching Totten that causes melt and acceleration. 
During the next century, winds are expected to intensify and migrate closer to the East Antarctic coast as a result of increased atmospheric greenhouse gas. This study suggests that as winds over the Southern Ocean intensify, so will Totten Glacier's contribution to global sea level rise. 
"Ice sheet sensitivity to wind forcing has been hypothesized for a long time, but it takes decades of observation to show unequivocal cause and effect," said Donald Blankenship, a senior researcher at UTIG who contributed to this study and Roberts' study. "Now we're at the point where we can explicitly show the links between what happens in the atmosphere, what happens in the ocean, and what happens to the Antarctic Ice Sheet." Wanted: a medical doctor for a cold adventure Paris (ESA) Nov 03, 2017 Want to help humanity's exploration of our Solar System? Do you have a medical degree and are not afraid of the dark or the cold? ESA is looking for someone to spend over six months in Antarctica running research to prepare for missions to the Moon and Mars. The Italian-French Concordia research station sits on an Antarctic plateau 3200 m above sea level. thread.section_title: Criminal Finances Act – Wright Vigar TaxApp
thread.title: Criminal Finances Act
thread.title_full: Criminal Finances Act

posts.author: wrightvigartaxapp
posts.title: Criminal Finances Act
posts.text:
The Criminal Finances Act 2017 took effect on 30 September 2017. It makes companies and partnerships, a ‘relevant body’, criminally liable if they fail to prevent the facilitation of tax evasion being carried out by an employee, anyone acting on their behalf or someone acting as an agent. If found guilty, the business could face unlimited fines and potentially further consequential sanctions within their industry or profession.
This Act has the effect of creating an offence at corporate and partnership level which does not require the directors/partners to have had any knowledge of the offence in question. Broadly, the offence is the failure to prevent the crimes of those who act for or on behalf of the corporate body or partnership instead of the need to attribute criminal acts to that body.
For a firm to be criminally liable under the new Act, there are three elements of the offence:
There must be the execution of a criminal act of tax evasion. The crime must have been facilitated or carried out by a person associated with a relevant body. The relevant body failed to initiate adequate prevention procedures in relation to the act carried out by the associated person. A defence is available when it can be shown that ‘reasonable prevention procedures’ were in place to prevent the associated person from committing or facilitating the crime; or that it would have been unreasonable or disproportionate to expect such procedures to be in place.
The government advises that any reasonable prevention procedures should be based on six guiding principles:
Risk assessment – the relevant body should assess the nature and extent of its exposure to the risk of an associated person committing a criminal act; Proportionality – the procedures should take into account the nature, scale and complexity of the relevant body’s activities; Top level commitment – the management of the relevant body should be committed to preventing illegal acts and should foster a culture that tax evasion and its facilitation is never acceptable; Due Diligence – with appropriate procedures put in place with respect to all people who perform services for the relevant body; Communication – training staff and ensuring the message effectively gets across to all employees and agents; Monitoring and reviewing – ensuring that whatever procedures are put into place are regularly reviewed and updated and amended where necessary. Please contact us if you require further information on this issue.
Internet link: GOV.UK Tackling tax evasion corporate-offence

posts.author: VieVie (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: USAI PELANTIKAN ANGGOTA DPRD ANIES INGATKAN AGAR JANGAN KORUPSI
posts.text:
USAI PELANTIKAN ANGGOTA DPRD ANIES INGATKAN AGAR JANGAN KORUPSI 
Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan mengingatkan anggota DPRD DKI agar tidak mengulangi kembali kasus korupsi Uninterruptable Power Supply (UPS) yang menjerat anggota Fraksi Hanura Fahmi Zulfikar.   Dia meminta agar tata kelola di Pemprov DKI bisa diperbaiki. Untuk diketahui, Fahmi merupakan terdakwa kasus dugaan korupsi pengadaan Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS).  
Di mana perbuatan ini juga membuat negara mengalami kerugian sebesar Rp 81,5 miliar. Dia mengatakan, cara untuk menanggulangi agar tidak terjadi korupsi yaitu dengan menjaga komunikasi antar eksekutif dan legislatif.  
Sehingga tugas yang dilakukan juga bisa terlaksana dengan baik, sehingga mampu menciptakan transparansi untuk kepentingan masyarakat. 
Diketahui hari ini Fahmi Zulfikar resmi diberhentikan dari DPRD DKI Jakarta. Fahmi dicopot dari kursi anggota DPRD DKI lantaran menjadi terdakwa kasus korupsi Uninterruptable Power Supply (UPS).  Dan digantikan dengan oleh politikus Hanura Romli H Suruh. Status Fahmi adalah terdakwa dalam kasus korupsi UPS, yang masuk dalam pengadaan pada tahun 2014.  
Penyidik Direktorat Tindak Pidana Korupsi Bareskrim Polri menetapkan dua anggota DPRD DKI Jakarta periode 2009-2014 sebagai tersangka kasus dugaan korupsi pengadaan uninterruptible power supply (UPS).

thread.title_full: 지방자치단체 빚 1년 만에 1.5조원 줄었다 (행정안전부) : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 기본부터
posts.title: 지방자치단체 빚 1년 만에 1.5조원 줄었다 (행정안전부)
posts.text:
경제 기본부터 지방자치단체 빚 1년 만에 1.5조원 줄었다 (행정안전부) 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/hackputer/221134636537 171101 (재정협력과) 지방자치단체 빚 1년 만에 1.5조원 줄었다(외부).hwp 내 컴퓨터 저장 네이버 클라우드 저장 지방자치단체 빚 1 년 만에 1.5 조원 줄었다
행정안전부, 2016년 결산 지방재정 정보 통합공시 □ 2016 년 말 지방자치단체 채무액 은 26.4 조 원으로 , 2015 년 말 27.9 조원 대비 1.5 조원 감소 했다 . 예산대비 채무비율 도 전국 평균 11.8% 로 2015 년 13.4% 대비 1.6%p 줄었다 .
○ 재정자립도 는 전국 평균이 55.8% 로 2015 년 54.9% 대비 0.9%p 상승 하여 , 지방재정 건전성이 다소 개선 된 것으로 나타났다 .
□ 행정안전부 ( 장관 김부겸 ) 는 주민들이 자치단체의 한 해 살림살이를 편하게 찾아보고 유사 자치단체와 비교 할 수 있도록 , 지방채무를 비롯한 32 개 재정정보 를 10 월 31 일 ‘ 지방재정 365 ( http://lofin.mois.go.kr)’ 에 통합공시 하였다 .
○ 특히 이번 2016 년 결산 통합공시는 국민이 공개되는 정보를 결정 하는데 직접 참여 하여 , ‘ 지방재정 공개 국민자문단 ’ * 에서 공시항목이 최종 결정되었다 .
* 지방재정 공개 국민자문단 : 일반 국민 , 기자 , 전문가 , 지자체 등 20 여명으로 구성
□ 이번 공시항목 중 눈에 띄는 내용은 지방채무의 감소 와 재정자립도의 소폭 상승 이다 .
○ 지방채무는 2013 년부터 꾸준히 감소하였는데 , 행정안전부는 지방채무 감소의 원인으로 2012 년부터 시행된 지방재정위기관리제도 , 채무현황 공개 , 투자심사제도 강화 등 제도적 보완과 함께 ,
○ 자치단체가 무리한 투자사업 및 불필요한 지출을 억제 하고 , 순세계 잉여금 등을 채무상환 재원으로 활용해 온 결과로 분석했다 .
○ 또한 채무 외에도 통합부채 ( 자치단체 부채 + 지방공기업 + 출자 · 출연기관 부채 ) 및 우발부채 등을 종합적으로 관리하는 등 재정 건전성 제고를 위해 노력하고 있다 .
※ 채무규모 ( 조원 ) : (’12) 27.1 → (’13) 28.6 → (’14) 28.0 → (’15) 27.9 → (’16) 26.4 채무비율 (%) : (’12) 15.4 → (’13) 15.5 → (’14) 14.8 → (’15) 13.4 → (‘16) 11.8
□ 특히 이번 결산 공시에서는 재정자립도 등 그동안 계속 공개되던 항목을 일반 국민의 눈높이에 맞추어 기준을 개선 하였다 * .
* 재정자립도 , 재정자주도 , 통합재정수지비율 : ‘ 최종예산 ’ 기준 → ‘ 결산 ’ 기준
○ 그간 재정자립도 등이 결산 공시에서 ‘ 결산 ’ 기준이 아닌 ‘ 최종예산 ’ 기준으로 공개 되어 일반 국민에게 혼동의 여지 가 있었는데 , 이번 결산 공시부터는 ‘ 결산 ’ 기준으로 공개하도록 전면 개선 하였다 .
□ 이에 따라 2016 년 ‘ 결산 ’ 기준 으로 산출한 자치단체 재정자립도는 전국 평균이 55.8% 로 2015 년 54.9% 대비 0.9%p 상승 하여 , 최근 5 년 중 가장 높은 수치 를 기록하였으나 ,
- 여전히 재정자립도가 50% 대에 머물러 , 지방재정이 매우 열악 한 것으로 드러났다 .
※ 재정자립도 (%) : (’12) 51.1 → (’13) 50.2 → (’14) 51.9 → (’15) 54.9 → (’16) 55.8 재정자주도 (%) : (’12) 79.4 → (’13) 77.5 → (’14) 76.6 → (’15) 76.1 → (’16) 77.2
※ 재정자립도 산식 = [ 지방세 ( 지방교육세 제외 )+ 세외수입 ] / 예산규모 x 100
○ 행정안전부는 재정자립도가 상승한 것은 비과세 · 감면 축소 및 경기 회복세에 따른 지방세 징수액 증가 와 전담조직 설치 , 운영실적 진단 · 공개제도 등으로 인한 세외수입 증가 가 주요인이라고 분석했다 .
※ 지방세 ( 지방교육세 제외 ) 징수액 : (’15) 65.2 조 → (’16) 69.3 조 (6.3% ↑ )
※ 지방세외수입 징수액 : (’15) 26.6 조 → (’16) 28.7 조 (7.9% ↑ )
□ 김현기 지방재정경제실장은 “ 행정안전부는 재정건전성 향상 을 위해 지방과 함께 노력 할 계획 ” 이라면서 ,
○ “ 아울러 더 많은 재정정보를 , 알기 쉽게 , 적시에 공개하여 주민에 의한 지방재정 자율통제 기반 을 구축해 나가겠다 .” 라고 밝혔다 .

Από τους αστυνομικούς του Αστυνομικού Τμήματος Nαυπακτίας σχηματίστηκε δικογραφία για κλοπή σε βάρος αγνώστων δραστών. thread.title: Пять человек пострадали в аварии с микроавтобусом на Колыме
thread.title_full: Пять человек пострадали в аварии с микроавтобусом на Колыме

posts.author: Наталья Преблагина
posts.title: Пять человек пострадали в аварии с микроавтобусом на Колыме
posts.text:
Пять человек пострадали в аварии с микроавтобусом на Колыме Пять человек пострадали в аварии с микроавтобусом на Колыме 2017-11-07 12:02:01"> Партийный переулок, д. 1, к. 57, с. 3 115093 Москва, Россия info@iz.ru вкл выкл 
В Магаданской области начата проверка по факту ДТП, случившегося 4 ноября на 1439-м км ФАД «Колыма». В результате лобового столкновения джипа и микроавтобуса пять человек получили травмы различной степени тяжести. 
По предварительной информации, 49-летний мужчина за рулем автомобиля Nissan Patrol выехал на встречку, где врезался в Toyota Noah под управлением 37-летнего гражданина, сообщает ИА MagadanMedia . Оба водителя и три пассажира госпитализированы. 
Ранее портал iz.ru сообщал, что утром 5 ноября ДТП с участием грузовика и рейсового автобуса произошло в Красноярске, погибли два человека . На улице Пограничников водитель маршрута № 94 выехал с прилегающей территории и допустил столкновение с грузовиком, после чего также задел четыре припаркованные иномарки: Nissan, Mazda, две Toyota. Пассажиров в салоне автобуса на момент ДТП не было. Погибли водитель и кондуктор. ПОДРОБНЕЕ ПО ТЕМЕ Редакция 
Авторское право на систему визуализации содержимого портала iz.ru, а также на исходные данные, включая тексты, фотографии, аудио- и видеоматериалы, графические изображения, иные произведения и товарные знаки принадлежит ООО «Мультимедийный информационный центр «Известия». Указанная информация охраняется в соответствии с законодательством РФ и международными соглашениями. 
Частичное цитирование возможно только при условии гиперссылки на iz.ru. 
АО «АБ «РОССИЯ» — партнер рубрики «Экономика»

thread.title: Jovem vĂtima de grave acidente em Monteiro nĂŁo resiste e morre no trauma de Campina Grande
thread.title_full: Jovem vĂtima de grave acidente em Monteiro nĂŁo resiste e morre no trauma de Campina Grande

posts.author: Fernando Cabeleireiro (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Jovem vĂtima de grave acidente em Monteiro nĂŁo resiste e morre no trauma de Campina Grande
posts.text:
Faleceu na tarde desta segunda feira (06) no hospital regional de Campina Grande, o jovem de nome  Alife,  que foi vĂtima de acidente automobilĂstico na rodovia BR-110, no municĂpio de Monteiro. 
O mesmo ficou gravemente ferido e foi em estado grave para Campina Grande, mas nĂŁo resistiu aos ferimentos. (Tribuna do Cariri)
